text: Ara musa tara sampradaya theke sattara jana lokake amadera nirdharita sthane ekatra ha'oyara jan'ya manonita karalena. Amadera madhye yara nirbodha, tara ya kareche se jan'ya ki apani amaderake dhbansa karabena? Eta to sudhu apanara pariksa, ya dbara apani yake icche bipadgami karena ebam yake icche satpathe paricalita karena.
